name: Game About Story
description:
Sorry for my horrible time management, because as you might've seen... I didn't really finish the last level. I tried to use things like NavMesh and Post Processing, and I learned a whole lot from them (which is what a game jam is all about after all).

This was very rushed on my part but I plan to keep this project alive or else make another game because this is my first game to come out of unity and the farthest I've gotten on a project so far.
